mapper.select: SELECT funding_thumb_img_url, product_name, farm_name, farm_address, user_funding_date, total_funding_pct, user_funding_amout, user_funding_pct, product_status FROM farm_and_product A INNER JOIN (SELECT round(SUM(user_funding_pct)) total_funding_pct, product_serial_num, user_serial_num, user_funding_pct, user_funding_amout, user_funding_date FROM funding_history WHERE user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} GROUP BY product_serial_num ) B ON A.product_serial_num = B.product_serial_num

SELECT QUERY1.auction_thumb_img_url, QUERY1.product_name, QUERY1.farm_name, QUERY1.farm_address, QUERY1.auction_deadline, QUERY1.product_status, QUERY2.max_user_price FROM (SELECT b.product_serial_num, user_serial_num, auction_thumb_img_url, product_name, farm_name, farm_address, auction_deadline, b.product_status FROM auction_history a INNER JOIN farm_and_product b ON a.product_serial_num = b.product_serial_num INNER JOIN auction_reg_info c ON a.product_serial_num = c.product_serial_num WHERE a.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num}) AS QUERY1 join (SELECT product_serial_num, MAX(user_price) max_user_price FROM auction_history WHERE product_serial_num IN (SELECT product_serial_num FROM auction_history WHERE user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ) GROUP BY product_serial_num) as QUERY2 ON QUERY1.product_serial_num = QUERY2.product_serial_num

SELECT farm_and_product.product_serial_num, farm_and_product.product_name, round(funding_reg_info.target_total_amount/10000) AS min_amount, farm_and_product.expected_planting_date, farm_and_product.farm_square_footage, round(SUM(funding_history.user_funding_pct)) as funding_pct, DATEDIFF(funding_reg_info.funding_deadline, NOW()) as d_day, farm_and_product.funding_thumb_img_url, ifnull(user_cart.user_serial_num,0) is_cart FROM farm_and_product LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_history ON funding_history.product_serial_num = farm_and_product.product_serial_num LEFT OUTER JOIN funding_reg_info ON farm_and_product.product_serial_num = funding_reg_info.product_serial_num LEFT OUTER JOIN user_cart ON farm_and_product.product_serial_num = user_cart.product_serial_num WHERE farm_and_product.product_status ='펀딩진행중' AND user_cart.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} GROUP BY farm_and_product.product_serial_num

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.product_regdate , fap.farm_address, Date(upsh.sharing_date) AS sharing_date, upsh.user_bank, upsh.user_account, upsh.user_profit AS deposit FROM user_profit_sharing_history AS upsh JOIN farm_and_product fap ON upsh.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num left outer JOIN auction_history ah ON upsh.product_serial_num = ah.product_serial_num WHERE upsh.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND ah.auction_status = 'O' ORDER BY upsh.sharing_date;

SELECT fap.product_name, ph.product_serial_num, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, Date(ph.update_date) AS update_date, DATE_FORMAT(ph.update_date, '%H:%i') AS update_time FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ORDER BY ph.update_date

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, DATE(ph.update_date) AS update_date, DATE_FORMAT(ph.update_date, '%H:%i') AS update_time FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND DATE(ph.update_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY ph.update_date
